title: 1038 revision deleted TimeoutException that still used

comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~reldan

comments.content: This was actually my fault. I meant to remove the try/except there. I couldn't find any place in the code where a TimeoutException would actually be raised, that's why I deleted it. Best move here would be to do what I originally intended to do and delete that try/except block.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~bcwaldon
